thread.section_title: Colors Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service
thread.title_full: Great service - Review of Colors Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Newton J
title: Great service
text:
Rooms were ok, a few things needed to be fixed such as the toilet seat and shower head, but the day after I notified reception they were fixed properly. The staff at the counter were incredibly helpful.
Great value for money
Beds comfortable and good selection of tv channels in English. Loved the balcony.
Great location, only downfall is there is no elevator, so bring your muscles if you have luggage!
